document_data.name: Cedric Carrathal
document_data.mainbody: '''Cedric Carrathal''' was High King of [[Callidyrr]] in the early 13{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|33}} Like his predecessors, although he held the title of High King of the [[Moonshae Isles]], he was considered to be merely a figurehead by the [[Ffolk]] outside of Callidyrr.
document_data.Relationships: He was a member of the [[Carrathal Dynasty]] and was the grandson of his predecessor, [[Adrian Carrathal|King Adrian]]. His eventual successor was his son, [[Vance Carrathal|Vance]].
